dt: {bc}any of the alternative forms of a gene that may occur at a given locus {dx_def}see {dxt|locus||3}{/dx_def}
{bc}either of a pair of alternative {d_link|Mendelian|Mendelian} characters {dx_def}see {dxt|character:1||1b(3)}{/dx_def} (such as smooth and wrinkled seed in the pea)

either of a pair of alternative Mendelian characters (such as smooth and wrinkled seed in the pea)

dt: {bc}an allele of a genetic locus having more than two allelic forms within a population

shortdef: an allele of a genetic locus having more than two allelic forms within a population
